title: Bead 6 - Transaction mutations (v1 core)
description: Implement TransactionService + mutation commands with dry-run, --yes gating, idempotency, and invariants (single id for amount; reject transfers for account set).
acceptance_criteria: Re-running set commands is no-op; dry-run never mutates; invariants enforced; commands map to porcelain operations.

description: Create TransactionService with dependencies injected.
acceptance_criteria: Service compiles and exports mutation methods.

title: Bead 1 - CLI output and error handling baseline
description: Implement OutputWriter + exit code mapping; wire CLI root/handlers to format output consistently (table/json/tsv/ids) and enforce stdout vs stderr.
acceptance_criteria: config show --format json emits valid JSON; usage errors exit 2; runtime errors exit 70.

title: B1-01 Define OutputFormat enum + parser
description: Add OutputFormat type and parse/validate --format values.
acceptance_criteria: Invalid format values exit 2 with clear error.

title: B1-10 Stdout/stderr discipline
description: Centralize stdout for data, stderr for errors/diagnostics.
acceptance_criteria: Commands never mix data into stderr.

title: B1-11 Exit code mapping
description: Map usage/runtime errors to ExitCode in root handler.
acceptance_criteria: Usage errors exit 2; runtime errors exit 70.

title: B1-12 Unit tests: writers
description: Add tests for JSON/TSV/IDS/table writers.

title: B1-13 Unit tests: exit codes
description: Add tests for usage vs runtime exit codes.

title: B1-14 Update CLI_CONVENTIONS
description: Document output formats, stdout/stderr rules, and exit codes.

title: B1-15 Table column helpers
description: Add reusable table column definitions for common entities.

title: B1-16 Help examples
description: Add help examples for --format usage in root/help text.
acceptance_criteria: Help shows at least one example per format.

title: B1-17 Format negotiation test
description: Add test for --format override precedence in CLI.

title: B1-18 Error rendering policy
description: Implement error rendering helper for stderr.
acceptance_criteria: Errors include message and optional code details.

title: B1-19 OutputWriter typing
description: Add type guards for writer output shapes.
acceptance_criteria: Type checks prevent mismatched output payloads.

title: B1-02 OutputWriter interface + factory
description: Create OutputWriter abstraction and factory based on format.

title: B1-20 CLI root refactor
description: Refactor root handler to reduce duplicate error handling.
acceptance_criteria: Root error handling is centralized and tested.

title: B1-03 JSON writer
description: Implement JSON writer with stable field output.
acceptance_criteria: JSON output is valid and pretty-printed or compact per convention.

title: B1-04 TSV writer
description: Implement TSV writer with header row.
acceptance_criteria: TSV output is tab-separated and deterministic order.

title: B1-05 IDS writer
description: Implement ids writer for list outputs.
acceptance_criteria: IDs are newline-separated with no extra text.

title: B1-06 Table writer
description: Implement table writer with column definitions.
acceptance_criteria: Table output renders with aligned columns and localized dates.

title: B1-07 Date formatting helpers
description: Add date formatting utilities for table vs raw formats.
acceptance_criteria: Table uses locale; raw formats keep YYYY-MM-DD.

title: B1-08 Root --format flag wiring
description: Plumb global --format into CLI root and context.
acceptance_criteria: All commands receive format via context.

title: B1-09 Config show uses OutputWriter
description: Update config show handler to use OutputWriter.

title: Bead 2 - Config resolution and auth context
description: Add createAppContext to resolve token/budget id from flags, env, and config with clear error messages.
acceptance_criteria: Missing token yields actionable error; env overrides work; --budget-id overrides config.

title: B2-01 Define AppContext
description: Define AppContext type (token, budgetId, io, config, db).
acceptance_criteria: AppContext type used across CLI handlers.

acceptance_criteria: Docs show env var usage examples.

description: Ensure config show redacts token value.
acceptance_criteria: Token not printed in plain text.

title: B2-13 Config path resolution
description: Centralize config dir/path helper.
acceptance_criteria: Config dir is stable across commands.

title: B2-14 AppContext tests
description: Add unit tests for createAppContext.

title: B2-15 CLI flag validation
description: Validate --budget-id format as UUID.

description: Document precedence order in CLI docs.

acceptance_criteria: Context creation is centralized and unit-tested.

acceptance_criteria: Env vars override config file values.

description: Implement --budget-id and --token overrides in context.
acceptance_criteria: CLI flags take precedence over env/config.

description: Fallback to config file when env/flags absent.
acceptance_criteria: Config values used when no overrides present.

title: B2-06 Missing token error
description: Add actionable error for missing token.
acceptance_criteria: Error includes how to set token.

title: B2-07 Missing budget id error
description: Add error for commands requiring budget id.
acceptance_criteria: Error includes how to set budget id.

title: B2-08 Wire handlers
description: Update CLI handlers to use AppContext.
acceptance_criteria: Handlers receive context instead of ad-hoc config.

title: B2-09 Tests: precedence
description: Add tests for flags > env > config precedence.

title: Bead 7 - History journaling
description: Record applied mutations in history_actions with argv, ids, forward/inverse patch; add history show command.
acceptance_criteria: After mutation, history show lists entry with enough data for future revert.

description: Implement output formatting for history show.

description: Add tests for history recording and show.

description: Add optional filters (limit, since) to history show.

title: Epic 0 - Rename ynac to nab
description: Rename project, CLI binary, docs, and config paths from ynac to nab.
acceptance_criteria: CLI binary and docs use nab; config paths and env vars updated or aliased.

title: R0-01 Naming decisions
description: Decide final naming conventions (binary, config dir, env vars).

title: R0-10 CI/scripts
description: Update scripts and tooling references to nab.
acceptance_criteria: Scripts run with new binary name.

description: Update docs references from ynac to nab.

description: Decide on and implement ynac alias or migration notes.

title: R0-09 Config migration
description: Add migration or note for existing config paths.
acceptance_criteria: Old config path handled or documented.

acceptance_criteria: listBudgets/listTransactions succeed; 401/404/429 map to typed errors; retries only on GET.
